org.javascool.gui
Class JVSMainPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.javascool.gui.JVSMainPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public final class JVSMainPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

The main panel for Java's cool This class wich is very static contain all that we need to run Java's cool like save and open file command. This class can only be called by JVSMain on instance otherwise it can throw very big errors

Author:
Philippe Vienne
See Also:
Serialized Form

close

public static java.lang.Boolean close()
Handle the close application task Check if all files are saved and if the user want to close the application

Returns:
True meen that app can be close and false that app can NOT be closed

closeAllFiles

public static java.lang.Boolean closeAllFiles()
Handle the close file task Check if all files are saved and if the user want to continue

Returns:
True meen that app can be close and false that app can NOT be closed

saveFileIdBeforeClose

public static int saveFileIdBeforeClose(java.lang.String fileId)
Ask to user to save a file before it close

Parameters:
fileId - The file id
Returns:
1 meen that file is saved or that user not want to save the file. 0 meen that there was an error during the save of file. -1 meen that user want to stop all that happend (Cancel option).
